translation.en: They might be by in a day or two.
translation.es: Quizá vengan en uno o dos días.

translation.en: When you get your boy alone, you tell him to get separated first chance he gets.
translation.es: Cuando esté a solas con su hijo,dígale que debe separase de ellos.

translation.en: -They'll come right back to see him. -We'll be waiting.
translation.es: Volverán de inmediato a verlo. Estaremos esperando.

translation.en: -Why should I trust you? -Because I said.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué confiaría en ustedes?- Porque sí.

translation.en: That's just how he's built.
Well, they got a rule.
If they get separated, they wait a couple days
translation.es: Si alguien se separa, esperan unos díasa que se calmen las cosas

translation.en: for the air to clear and then meet up back at my house.
translation.es: esperan unos díasa que se calmen las cosas y luego se reúnen en mi casa.

translation.en: Clyde won't be taken alive.
translation.es: A Clyde no lo atraparán con vida.

translation.en: Neither will your boy, sir, unless he takes his one chance now.
translation.es: A su hijo tampoco, señor,a menos que aproveche esta oportunidad.

translation.en: I like my house.
-Excuse me? -I like my house!
Clyde bought it for me, and I don't want y'all shooting it up.
translation.es: Clyde me la regaló,y no quiero que maten a nadie allí.

translation.en: They'll be around for Henry. There ain't but one way in, one way out.
translation.es: Vendrán a buscar a Henry. Solo hay una forma de entrar,la calle Ringgold.

translation.en: That's Ringgold Road.
translation.es: Solo hay una forma de entrar,la calle Ringgold.

translation.en: Ringgold Road.
Once my boy gets clear, you...
translation.es: Cuando mi hijo esté a salvo,

translation.en: Well, you can kill 'em there.
All right.
Take two.
-Two. -There you go.
Looks like we're outnumbered by Texans, Henderson.
translation.es: Parece que nos gana un texano, Sanderson.

translation.en: Well, we need these Dallas boys, the only ones
translation.es: Necesitamos a estos tipos de Dallas,

translation.en: who can make a positive identification.
translation.es: son los únicos que pueden identificarlos.

translation.en: Old Ivy said that car's loaded with firepower.
translation.es: El viejo Ivy diceque tienen el auto lleno de armas.

translation.en: They got machine guns, hand grenades, a thousand rounds of shells.
It's an armory on four wheels.
-Well, we'll find out. -Gonna have us a hunt.
translation.es: - Ya lo veremos.- Saldremos de cacería.

translation.en: Gonna skin us some deer.
Dang, if I don't have an Arkansas Straight.
Dallas paper gave me a camera to film it when it happens.
translation.es: El periódico de Dallas me dio una cámarapara filmar cuando ocurra.

translation.en: Said he'd pay me. Can y'all believe that?
What the hell is this world coming to?
translation.es: ¿Qué diablos le está pasando al mundo?

translation.en: -Well, there we go. -Three sevens?
Maybe we should put six bills in the pot, homme. Make it interesting.
translation.es: Deberíamos poner billetes en el pozopara hacerlo más interesante.

translation.en: No. Cap says no money in the game, nor drinking on Sundays.
translation.es: No, el capitán no quiere que apostemosni que bebamos los domingos.

translation.en: Can't be much fun.
Yeah, well, there's a place for me in heaven, I'll tell you that.
translation.es: Pues, ya tengo mi lugar en el cielo,eso seguro.

translation.en: What's he doing out there?
He likes to be alone sometimes.
translation.es: A veces le gusta estar solo.

translation.en: Sheriff Smoot said you and Hamer killed more than 50 men between you.
translation.es: El sheriff Smoot dijo que Hamery usted mataron a más de 50 hombres.

translation.en: Killed more than that in one evening.
I didn't mean to pry.
It's all right, kid. Ante up, gents.
I was young. Younger than you.
translation.es: Era joven. Más joven que tú.

translation.en: South Texas, a place called Candelario.
translation.es: En un lugar del sur de Texasllamado Candelaria.

translation.en: Ranger Company C. Had about 60 bandits pinned down in a dry wash.
translation.es: La Compañía C de los Rangers. Acorralamos a 60 bandidosa orillas de un arroyo.

translation.en: These fellas burned half a dozen ranches,
translation.es: Estos tipos habían quemadomedia docena de ranchos.

translation.en: killed a dozen...
and raped just about as many.
Anyway, every time we'd ride in there
translation.es: Como fuera,cada vez que llegábamos a capturarlos,

translation.en: to take 'em, we'd yell out, "Manos arribas."
translation.es: Como fuera,cada vez que llegábamos a capturarlos, gritábamos: "¡Manos arriba!",

translation.en: You know, "Hands up."
Well, they'd...
fire on us, and we'd lose a man. Went on like that for two days.
translation.es: nos disparaban y mataban a los nuestros.Eso duró dos días.

translation.en: So they sent down... young Captain Hamer,
my friend Pancho.
Cap says... "What's going on down here?"
"Any time we yell out, 'manos arribas,' like the law tells us to...
translation.es: Le dijimos: "Cada vez que gritamos'Manos arriba', como dice la ley,

translation.en: they open up on us."
Cap says, “We're going in there afore dawn and, this time,
translation.es: Él respondió: "Entraremosantes del amanecer y, esta vez,

translation.en: don't no-damn-body yell out 'manos arribas.' Just shoot 'em."
translation.es: que nadie grite 'Manos arriba'".  Solo dispárenles.

translation.en: Well, that night...
them bandits were celebrating, drunk.
Most of 'em asleep by the fire. And we went in.
translation.es: La mayoría dormía junto a la hoguera.Y entramos.

translation.en: Some of the boys refused to go.
Refused to just start shooting men.
But I went with Frank. Like I said, he's my friend.
translation.es: Pero yo entré con Frank,y como les dije, es mi amigo.

translation.en: He gave me the nod.
We let 'em have it.
We shot that arroyo all to hell before most of them fellas even woke up.
translation.es: Enviamos al infierno a todos en el arroyoantes de que se despertaran.

translation.en: I was... jittery.
A mule came out from behind a cactus, and I...
translation.es: Una mula salió de detrás de un cactus,

translation.en: shot the man riding it half a dozen times.
translation.es: y le disparé seis vecesal hombre que la cabalgaba.

translation.en: Turned out to be a...
13-year-old boy just...
trying to run away.
I still see his face.
Whole thing was over in five minutes. Counted 54 dead.
translation.es: Todo terminó en cinco minutos.Contamos 54 muertos.

translation.en: Counting was over, Cap sat on a rock, holstered his gun, and said...
translation.es: Y cuando terminamos,el capitán se sentó sobre una roca,  enfundó su arma y dijo:

translation.en: "Manos arribas, you sons of bitches."
Came back,
governor gave us all medals.
translation.es: y el gobernador nos dio medallas a todos.

translation.en: My boy got loose.
When he comes, he gonna be coming
translation.es: Cuando venga, lo hará desde el sury vendrá directamente hacia aquí.

translation.en: from the south, which will bring him by you.
translation.es: lo hará desde el sury vendrá directamente hacia aquí.

translation.en: -I figure you fellas got it from here. -Ivy...
Turn your truck around, park it the wrong side.
translation.es: Da vuelta tu camióny estaciona del otro lado.

translation.en: What?
-You're staying with us. -That wasn't part of the deal.
translation.es: Te quedarás con nosotros. Eso no era parte del trato.

translation.en: The deal ain't done till it's done. Now, park it.
translation.es: El trato no se cumple hasta que se cumple.¡Estaciona ahí!

translation.en: Jack up the front right bumper and take off your tire.
translation.es: ¡Súbelo de adelante con el gatoy quítale un neumático!

translation.en: Clyde'll slow down and help him change it.
translation.es: Clyde se detendráy te ayudará a cambiarlo.

translation.en: -What? -Stash these cars.
How do I know I ain't gonna get shot?
You okay?
Yeah. Yes, sir.
We need you to identify these two.
Nobody said nothing about having to pull the trigger,
translation.es: Nadie dijo nadaacerca de apretar el gatillo.

translation.en: which means you don't have to.
-I'll be all right. -You sure?
Yeah.
When they get here, y'all stay behind the blind.
I'll present myself. You fire on my command.
translation.es: Si me presento, disparan a mi orden.

translation.en: We stay in the blind?
Yeah.
You walk out there?
That's an order, Gault.
Maney,
for the record, you only move like you're 75.
translation.es: ...para que conste, te mueves como si tuvieras 75 años.

translation.en: The reason I passed your house that day was 'cause I...
translation.es: El motivo por el que pasépor tu casa ese día...

translation.en: I wanted to spare you this.
That said, I'm...
real glad you're here.
Me, too, Pancho.
Me, too.
Ivy! Get out there!
Hurry up.
It's them.
Ford V-8.
Ted?
-Yeah. -You better look.
Yeah. It's Clyde.
This is it!
-Hey, Ivy. Need some help with that? -Yeah.
Stick 'em up.
Manos arribas.
Mr. Hamer? Excuse me, Mr. Hamer?
translation.es: ¿Señor Hamer? Disculpe. Sr. Hamer, lo llaman por teléfonode Associated Press, de Nueva York.

translation.en: There's a fella on the phone from the Associated Press in New York.
translation.es: Sr. Hamer, lo llaman por teléfonode Associated Press, de Nueva York.

translation.en: He says he'll give you $1,000 for a phone interview right now.
translation.es: Dicen que le darán mil dólaressi les da una entrevista ahora mismo.

translation.en: Got him on the line in the back.
Mr. Hamer?
Shame on you.
The nation has been freed from the worst killing rampage in its history.
translation.es: La nación ha sido liberadade la peor matanza de la historia.

translation.en: Retribution has been served, and J. Edgar Hoover has issued a formal announcement
translation.es: Se ha hecho justicia, y J. Edgar Hooverha emitido una declaración formal

translation.en: that the crime spree of Bonnie and Clyde--
translation.es: donde dice que la trayectoria delictivade Bonnie y Clyde...

translation.en: Care to comment on your role in the apprehension of Bonnie and Clyde?
translation.es: ¿Podría comentar sobre su papelen la captura de Bonnie y Clyde?

translation.en: I knew Hamer and Gault would get the job done,
translation.es: Yo sabía que Hamer y Gault lo harían.

translation.en: and that's why I chose 'em. Bottom line!
translation.es: Por eso los elegí, nada más.
